EmailTemplate.subject: Registration Confirmed: GoDirect Connectivity Conference in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
Your registration has been confirmed for the GoDirect Connectivity Conference in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia. Please save this email for future reference.
Event: GoDirect Connectivity Conference Date: Monday, April 30, 2018 Time: 8:30 a.m. - 2 p.m. Location: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel, Northern Ring Rd, Al Wadi Ar Riyadh, Riyadh, 11552, Saudi Arabia
We look forward to meeting you at the event.
Sincerely, Honeywell GoDirect Team godirect@honeywell.com <[[mailto:godirect@honeywell.com]]>
